entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
